mutants.original_line: score = sum([characteristics.get(pref, 0) for pref in preferences])
mutants.mutated_line: score = sum([characteristics.get(pref, 1) for pref in preferences])

mutants.original_line: score = sum([characteristics.get(pref, 0) for pref in preferences])
mutants.mutated_line: score = sum([characteristics.get(pref, -1) for pref in preferences])
